nodes.text: Alliance Starfighter Command was a branch in the Alliance to Restore the Republic's military that was in command of the Rebel Alliance Starfighter Corps. Even though Starfighter Command was commanded by General Antoc Merrick, he deferred to Colonel Bandwin Cor for the day-to-day decisions.

At some point prior to the Battle of Yavin, Colonel Cor sent a transmission to General Dodonna in which he stated that Cor, Merrick, and Gavin Dreis all believed that the X-wing should be the backbone of Starfighter Command.
